TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SystemBrushes extends System.Object

summary.span: 类的每个属性都是一个 ，它是 Windows 显示元素的颜色。

span.span: Each property of the class is a that is the color of a Windows display element.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置键盘快捷方式使用属性。The following code example shows how to set a keyboard shortcut using the property. 它还演示了如何使用方法。It also demonstrates how to use the method. 若要运行此示例中，将代码粘贴到窗体中，处理该窗体事件，并调用以下方法，传递`e`作为。To run this example, paste the code into a form, handle the form's event and call the following method, passing `e` as . [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.MiscExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.MiscExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.MiscExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.MiscExamples/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.MiscExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.MiscExamples/VB/form1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序工作区是多文档视图中未被文档占据的区域。The application workspace is the area in a multiple-document view that is not being occupied by documents.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Highlight As Brush
public: static property System::Drawing::Brush ^ Highlight { System::Drawing::Brush ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取表示选定项背景颜色的 。

span.span: Gets a that is the color of the background of selected items.

value.span: 一个 ，它是选定项的背景的颜色。

span.span: A that is the color of the background of selected items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 选定的项可能包括菜单项和选定的文本。Selected items may include menu items as well as selected text. 例如，画笔可能用于在列表框中选定项的背景的颜色。For example, the brush may be the color used for the background of selected items in a list box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 单击一个热跟踪项会执行该项。Single-clicking a hot-tracked item executes the item.
